alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:29AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Glynn, northeastern Brantley and southeastern Wayne Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 529 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Everett, or 11 miles west of Darien, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Everett, Mount Pleasant and Boys Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn; Wayne
